snippet.title: Slopecrashers Gameplay Trailer 2021
snippet.description:
Here is a new gameplay trailer for Slopecrashers - an arcade snowboarding game from byteparrot which is coming to Nintendo Switch, PC & more. 

This trailer shows the current state of the game as we are aproaching our alpha testing stage. If you want to participate in the alpha, feel free to join our discord: https://discord.gg/UsXE8Z8fQK

You can also wishlist the game now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1619580/Slopecrashers/

The developer of the game is also frequently streaming the development process on twitch, so feel free to check in and say "ratJAM": https://twitch.tv/peekstone

--------------------------------------------------
MUSIC: The amazing music in this trailer (and also in the game) is done by Benedict Nichols - https://www.benedictnichols.com/
--------------------------------------------------

We hope you enjoy the latest trailer and stay tuned for updates on our social media channels!

Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/byteparrot
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/byteparrot
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/byteparrot
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/byteparrot
Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@byteparrot
Blog: https://www.byteparrot.com/blog

Behind the scenes:

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCejqsUBleehDMoUCMiEH7mA
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/peekstone
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/peekstone
